name: Cards 'n Bullets
description:
My entry for the Bullet Hell Jam 2021 game jam, also being my first game jam project. Ran out of time so I couldn't add music or a title screen, but I love the result so far, I plan on updating it in the near future. The only things made outside the jam are the enemy dragon and the default Unity assets.

cards 'n Bullets is a mix of card game and bullet hell where battle takes 10 seconds. Of course I need to explain the card game rules since there's no tutorial.

Every turn you draw a card, then have to send one to the mana tube, and then draw yet another card. You can then choose to either use a card send another to the mana tube. Because I tripped while setting up the game, the mana tube is a bit cracked. Paying card cost may cause unintended effects.
